name: Panzer General: Allied Assault
summary: This is a newly developed game in the Panzer General series for Xbox Live Arcade.

esrb.synopsis: This is a strategy game in which players command American and German military units on a grid/game board. Players take turns rolling dice and using a variety of cards to summon tanks, infantry, and artillery on the grid. The pieces on the game board sometimes enter skirmishes that include depictions of soldiers firing at each other or planes dropping bombs on units, causing them to disappear from the grid.

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 12 years and over only.
It contains: Non realistic looking violence towards human characters - Violence causing minor injury only
This game allows the player to interact with other players ONLINE
